name: AIR (itch) (Hamilton Bros)
description: Hi, I’m Sky, age 10, and this is my first game where you fly in the air and collect all the rings in each level. The game has three levels, each with a different obstacle! There will be updates to the game that will have new levels, a hard mode, and maybe a new plane. Each time someone buys this game, %25 goes to Covid-19 relief and %25 goes to the Black Lives Matter movement. I love making games and supporting issues that are important to me. So dive into this new game where you fly through the AIR and support great causes!
